title: Why can't i post on boards?
body: I know that my account is higher than level 15, so why can't I post on the boards?

replies.body:
This has to do with how the systems are set-up.  While Riot owns both Boards and League, they are actually two separate systems.  Boards will try to get information from League (Account level, Summoner Icon, etc), but it may take some time.  By making a post here, you should be able to quicken this sync.  

From looking at it already, it seems that your level updated to 18!  :D  Let me know if you experience any other issues!
I'm not sure if you actually did anything, but its working normally now so thanks!
To clarify, I can't post comments or start topics on any level-restricted board, despite being higher level than the requirements.
